which ofc is true for both Rageblade and Spear).

Since when is no one except for Vayne(which I'm assuming you are crying about) using it. How about Varus, Kog'Maw, Kaisa, Kayle, and pretty much any on-hit build ever?

Actually I disagree with all of them (not that they're doing it, because they are, but with the ability to do it full stop). When those champions were created, the number of hits required to procc an effect was set at a balanced level (for some like Varus and Kog, the level is 1). Most of those have their own scaling boost, be it AP or AD, so every Phantom Hit effectively doubles that boost; Phantom Hit is effectively the Deathfire Grasp for On-Hits, and DFG was removed for being a stat-stick (albeit with a toxic extra stat-check active ability). The only On-Hits I can think of that don't deal damage themselves are Yi and Vayne; Yi gets an extra auto, so that's a 1-to-1 AD scaling, and Vayne gets faster access to %Max HP True Damage, which flat out should not exist at all, let alone be faster to achieve....

TL;DR I think Phantom Hit breaks all On-Hits and want it removed
